title: FS: T Card Sale Only T202 Mathewson/Meyer Left PSA 2.5 SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: T Card Sale Only T202 Mathewson/Meyer Left PSA 2.5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Super nice T202 Mathewson and an incredibly scarce autographed T222. The prices are SOLD For the T202 and SOLD for the trimmed autographed Strunk. PayPal friends/family please. Thanks for looking.

Joe K
